testcase.name: Add a new post
testcase.system-out: Given I create a new payload................................................passed When I send "AddPostAPI" with "POST" http request...........................passed Then The API call is successfull with status code "201".....................passed And verify "id" in response body is "101"...................................passed And verify "title" in response body is "foo"................................passed And verify "body" in response body is "bar".................................passed And verify "userId" in response body is "1".................................passed

testcase.name: Add a new post 2
